Package camzup.core

Class Ray3

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Ray
camzup.core.Ray3
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRay, IUtils, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class Ray3
extends Ray
A direction that extends from an originating point.
See Also:
Serialized Form
